text: Leo De Crignis (born 12 July 1952) is an Italian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 1976 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1976 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Udine
title: Leo De Crignis
